help_menu: Click the buttons below to get information about my commands. Note: All commands can be used with /
help_admins: Admin Commands: /pause: Pause the current stream. /resume: Resume the paused stream. /skip: Skip the current stream. /stop: Stop the current stream. /seek [seconds]: Fast forward the stream. /seekback [seconds]: Rewind the stream. /reload: Refreshes the admin cache.
help_auth: Auth Commands: Authorized users can manage the stream without being an admin. /auth: Add user to authorized list. /unauth: Remove user from authorized list.
help_blist: Blacklist Commands: Blacklisted chats and users cannot use the bot. /blacklist [ID]: Add chat/user to blacklist. /unblacklist [ID]: Remove chat/user from blacklist.
help_lang: Language Commands: This bot is multi-lingual. /lang: Change the bot's language.
help_ping: Ping Commands: /help: Shows the help menu. /ping: Checks latency and memory usage. /start: Starts the bot. /sudolist: Shows the list of sudo users.
help_play: Playback Commands: You can play music in video chats with the following commands. /play [name/link/reply]: Play music. /vplay [name/link/reply]: Play video. -f: Force play. -v: Play in video mode. Example: /play -f -v attention
help_queue: Queue Commands: /queue: Shows the songs in queue.
help_sudo: Sudo Commands: /ac: Shows count of active calls. /activevc: Shows list of active calls. /broadcast [reply]: Broadcast message to all groups. -nochat: Exclude groups. -user: Include users. -copy: Remove forward tag. Example: /broadcast -user -copy /eval: Executes the given code. /logs: Sends the log file. /logger [on|off]: Enables/disables the logger. /restart: Restarts the bot. /addsudo: Add user to sudo list. /rmsudo: Remove user from sudo list.
